{3}, Discard Eiyo's Guardian: Draw a card and create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“I've spent a lot of time tinkering not just with constructs, but lives. I needed to change that.”
